meanings.sent1: I need to resit the math test to improve my grade.
meanings.sent2: She will resit the driving test next week.
meanings.sent3: After forgetting to study, he had to resit the quiz with a sigh.
meanings.sent4: The idea of having to resit the exam felt like climbing a mountain.
meanings.sent5: I will resit the exam with determination and focus this time.

meanings.definition: To take a test for a second time.
meanings.sent1: He decided to resit the history exam to boost his score.
meanings.sent2: Students can resit the final exam if they fail the first time.
meanings.sent3: The student had to resit the test after oversleeping on the original exam day.
meanings.sent4: Resitting the exam felt like hitting the reset button on a video game.
meanings.sent5: I will resit the test and aim for a higher grade this time around.
